title: Mens Distressed Henley Shirts Retro Short Sleeve Tee Shirts Casual Button Down Washed T-Shirts for Men
description: A solid henley tee fits great for a muscular physique. It accentuates your physique and makes you look younger and sexy! Soft, comfy and breathable while perfect for casual and business casual wear.

All buttons are usable and make for different looks depending on event and venue! They can be buttoned and unbuttoned however you choose. It's great for having to protect yourself from sun even when it's not cold.

Men's soft and comfortable short sleeve tee shirts, slim fit henley shirts with seven buttons front design, soft to the touch for comfy wearing, pure cotton feels terrific all day long. Good for all genders and for all seasons!

Comfortable versatile slim fit casual henley shirts, suit for daily wear, work, gardening, sports, holiday, beach etc. Perfect gift for boyfriend, husband, brother, son, father, families and friends. Super comfy for sleep shirts, pajama, church,halloween costume, brunch shirt.

Men's casual button-down shirt looks sharp jeans, shorts or leggings. Great paired with pajama-type pants, flannel pants for lounging around. You can wear in chilly weather with a light jacket, or in warmer weather with the sleeves pulled up.
